newsitem.title: USA: Banco del Istmo has $70 mln commercial paper issue.
newsitem.headline: Banco del Istmo has $70 mln commercial paper issue.

text.p: Barclays Plc said Wednesday it led a syndicate which arranged a $70 million U.S. commercial paper program established by Banco del Istmo SA of Panama.
The Barclays Bank Plc Miami Agency said it issued a direct-pay letter of credit in connection with the financing.

Barclays said it was the second time Banco del Istmo accessed the U.S. capital markets as an alternative funding source to finance the growth of its lending activities. In October 1996 a $55 million trust certificates issue was fully subscribed.
The latest financing was originally intended to be $50 million, but was 40 percent oversubscribed, Barclays said.
